properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 19 at 2:57PM EST until February 21 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and seas 4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Northeast South Carolina coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM Thursday to 6 PM EST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening
to 3 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
